title: S3 Ep4: Spirits Speak... Through Technology! Hr.2
itunes:title: Spirits Speak... Through Technology! Hr.2
description: EVP Specialists Mark and Debby Constantino join Darkness Radio to talk about their techniques gathering EVP, some of their scariest cases, and they play some of their most frightening samples for us!
